CodeList.Name: Hepatic Findings About Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the test codes that describe hepatic findings.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A grading system to describe the severity of hepatic encephalopathy based on the level of mental status, per the West Haven Criteria. (NCI)

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Hepatic Findings About Test Code Terminology
